archimate:Requirement.name: SD.1.3.3e: e) patching and updating development and integration tools regularly (e.g. compilers, builders, integration tools, test platforms and environments), and restricting access to them
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
